TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirSyncRequestControl extends System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl

Docs.summary: The DirSyncRequestControl class is a directory control that enables the application to search the directory for objects that have changed since a previous state.

Docs.param: An opaque structure used by the server. It is updated by the directory during each , which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.

The AttributeCount property specifies the maximum number of attributes to return.

Docs.summary: The Cookie property contains an opaque structure used by the server.
Docs.value: An opaque structure used by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is updated by the directory during each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
